comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: The man on the light pole seems to be repairing or hooking up something.  If you download the tiff version you still can't quite make it out.  The men in line appear to be the civil war vets and they are carrying their own plates.  Bet that brought back memories.

comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
